Interface IWebSocket

Encapsulate logic required for communicating with web socket server from API.

Inherited Members
System.IDisposable.Dispose()
Namespace: Alpaca.Markets
Assembly: Alpaca.Markets.dll
Syntax
public interface IWebSocket : IDisposable

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

CloseAsync(CancellationToken)

Closes web socket communication channel. Connection state changes will be reported using Closed event and errors - using Error event.

Declaration
Task CloseAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken

A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Connection closing task for awaiting (if needed).
| Improve this Doc View Source

OpenAsync(CancellationToken)

Opens web socket communication channel. Connection state changes will be reported using Opened event and errors - using Error event.

Declaration

Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken

A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Connection opening task for awaiting (if needed).
